meanings.definition: A plant of the rose family with five-petaled flowers.
meanings.sent1: The cinquefoil in the garden bloomed beautifully.
meanings.sent2: I picked a cinquefoil to put in a vase.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel tried to hide his acorn under the cinquefoil.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as bright and delicate as a cinquefoil in full bloom.
meanings.sent5: The field was dotted with colorful cinquefoils, creating a stunning sight.

meanings.definition: A heraldic figure resembling a five-petaled flower.
meanings.sent1: The knight's shield bore a majestic cinquefoil emblem.
meanings.sent2: The royal banner displayed a golden cinquefoil.
meanings.sent3: The playful kitten pounced on the cinquefoil pattern of the carpet.
meanings.sent4: His bravery was a shining cinquefoil in the midst of adversity.
meanings.sent5: The ancient tapestry depicted a regal cinquefoil design fit for a king.
